SELECT P.* , ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT P.PRDT_ID PK_COL , P.PRDT_ID , P.PRDT_NM , P.PRDT_PRC , P.PRDT_CNTNT , P.PRDT_SRT , ORGN_FL_NM , UUID_FL_NM , FL_SIZE , FL_EXT , CMMN.CD_NM , P.PRDT_RGSTR , R.MBR_NM RGSTR_NM , P.PRDT_RGST_DT , P.MDFYR , M.MBR_NM MDFYR_NM , P.MDFY_DT , P.USE_YN , P.DEL_YN , EP.EVNT_PRDT_ID , EP.EVNT_ID , EP.EVNT_TTL , EP.EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , EP.EVNT_STRT_DT , EP.EVNT_END_DT FROM PRDT P LEFT JOIN CMMN_CD CMMN ON P.PRDT_SRT = CMMN.CD_ID LEFT JOIN MBR R ON P.PRDT_RGSTR = R.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN MBR M ON P.MDFYR = M.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT EP.EVNT_PRDT_ID , EP.PRDT_ID , EP.EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , E.EVNT_ID , E.EVNT_TTL , E.EVNT_STRT_DT , E.EVNT_END_DT FROM EVNT_PRDT EP INNER JOIN EVNT E ON EP.EVNT_ID = E.EVNT_ID WHERE E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SYSDATE >= E.EVNT_STRT_DT AND E.EVNT_END_DT >= SYSDATE) EP ON P.PRDT_ID = EP.PRDT_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND P.PRDT_SRT = #{prdtSrt}
AND P.PRDT_NM LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND P.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn}
AND EP.EVNT_ID IS
NOT
NULL
ORDER BY P.USE_YN DESC, P.PRDT_NM ASC) P

SELECT P.PRDT_ID PK_COL , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY P.PRDT_ID DESC) RNUM , P.PRDT_ID , P.PRDT_NM , P.PRDT_PRC , P.PRDT_CNTNT , P.PRDT_SRT , ORGN_FL_NM , UUID_FL_NM , FL_SIZE , FL_EXT , CMMN.CD_NM , P.PRDT_RGSTR , R.MBR_NM RGSTR_NM , P.PRDT_RGST_DT , P.MDFYR , M.MBR_NM MDFYR_NM , P.MDFY_DT , P.USE_YN , P.DEL_YN , EP.EVNT_PRDT_ID , EP.EVNT_ID , EP.EVNT_TTL , EP.EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , EP.EVNT_STRT_DT , EP.EVNT_END_DT FROM PRDT P LEFT JOIN CMMN_CD CMMN ON P.PRDT_SRT = CMMN.CD_ID LEFT JOIN MBR R ON P.PRDT_RGSTR = R.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN MBR M ON P.MDFYR = M.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT EP.EVNT_PRDT_ID , EP.PRDT_ID , EP.EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , E.EVNT_ID , E.EVNT_TTL , E.EVNT_STRT_DT , E.EVNT_END_DT FROM EVNT_PRDT EP INNER JOIN EVNT E ON EP.EVNT_ID = E.EVNT_ID WHERE E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SYSDATE >= E.EVNT_STRT_DT AND E.EVNT_END_DT >= SYSDATE) EP ON P.PRDT_ID = EP.PRDT_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y'

AND P.PRDT_NM LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND P.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn}

NOT
